sentences.english: Cheng says her mother was an advocate of this style of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 沈婆婆說她母親是這種服裝的支持者。

sentences.english: Tomorrow I am going to teach my grandma (on my mother's side) how to send email.
sentences.chinese: 聽日我會教我婆婆點樣發電郵。

sentences.english: Little had he thought that the old woman was just Hera herself .
sentences.chinese: 他並未想到此老婆婆竟然是赫拉本人。

sentences.english: This blind old lady relies completely on her walking stick to walk.
sentences.chinese: 這個瞎眼的老婆婆完全依靠柺棍走路。

sentences.english: Who do you think you're tisking to?
sentences.chinese: 婆婆來了以爲非你莫屬在跟誰說話？

sentences.english: Nearby, an old woman sells chocolate and cigarettes from a tiny kiosk.
sentences.chinese: 在附近的亭子裏有個老婆婆在賣巧克力和香菸。
路得對婆婆的忠誠並不耀目。

sentences.english: She wanted to be loved by her parents-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 女孩很想得到公公婆婆的喜愛。

sentences.english: Weekends we usually visit with my husband's family.
sentences.chinese: 週末我們常去我婆婆家。

sentences.english: There's no room for sentiment in business.
sentences.chinese: 做生意不能婆婆媽媽的感情用事。

sentences.english: We went back home last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 上個週末，去公公婆婆家。

sentences.english: Most desolating were those evenings the belle-mere had envisaged for them.
sentences.chinese: 最最淒涼的要數婆婆給她們設計的夜晚。

sentences.english: Eventually the old lady who owned the house started to become forgetful.
sentences.chinese: 後來，老婆婆變得健忘了。

sentences.english: The third is Chihiro riding the train for the Talisman to save money to send her mother a friend.
sentences.chinese: 第三個是千尋坐上火車爲錢婆婆送去咒符以拯救朋友。

sentences.english: Below the mother-in-law's pressure, zhang Wei plaque is low still take a risk parturient.
sentences.chinese: 在婆婆的壓力下，張薇血小板低仍冒險生子。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
